Well, before we knew it, in October 2011, Wicked Good Cupcakes was born. We received tons of requests to ship our cupcakes nationwide. input.problem_summary: Raccoons and other pests cause significant damage and disturbance to properties, leading to costly and often ineffective removal efforts.
input.solution_summary: The Critter Pricker is a humane deterrent system made of patented plastic strips that can be easily snapped together and shaped to protect various property locations from raccoons, unwanted cats, and even humans, by leveraging their hypersensitive hands and lack of depth perception.

output: Hi Sharks, my name is Joe Balasteri, I'm from Chihola Pennsylvania and I'm here seeking a hundred and fifteen thousand dollars for fifteen percent equity in my company. Sharks, property owners can never feel too secure. You never know who's gonna hop your fence, break on your property in the middle of night and rummage through your things. These bandits cause thousands of dollars in damages a day. You know who I'm talking about? Raccoons. Looking in the pest control industry for the last 15 years, I've seen it all. These little bandits dig through our trash cans, break into our attics to breed and defecate in our pools. Getting rid of raccoons can be costly and of course there's no guarantee more won't move in to take their place. So that's why I invented the Critter Pricker, the most humane way to protect your property against raccoons and other pesky wildlife. Being that raccoons have hyper sensitive hands and a lack of depth perception, once they come in contact with the Critter Pricker's patented plastic strips, they quickly move on. Goodbye trash panda, hello peace of mind! Plastic strips snap together very easily either end to end or side to side to customize those locations you want to protect. Also, our live hinges allow you to bend and shape the product around square and circuit locations such as bird feeders and fences. The Critter Pricker won't just keep your property free of raccoons but of unwanted cats and even humans. So who wants to get their paws on the Critter Pricker and see how it works? I got some samples for you.
